item.title: Building a Fantasy Ledger With Java Spring Boot
item.description:
Iâ€™ve been wanting to put together a beginner-friendly Java Spring Boot tutorial that takes you through everything starting from installing Java, to understanding the core principles of databases, CRUD operations and MVC while keeping it fun. But I didnâ€™t want to fall into the trap of making yet another todo app.

Since Iâ€™m a huge fan of fantasy media ğŸ§â€â™‚ï¸ and books like A Song of Ice and Fire and The Lord of the Rings, I decided to build a fantasy-themed ledger web app. In it, users can create mini log entries that persist through a backend database. The fantasy theme also gives us room to get creative with CSS and styling!
